column2: '''rámali''') is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "wing" and poetically "branch" of a tree.

column1: {{quote|Yéni únótimë ve rámar aldaron! ('long years numberless as the wings of trees!')<ref>{{RGEO|Namarie}}

column2: ''ramus'' means "branch" which mirrors the poetic usage of ''rámar'' as "wings (of trees)" > "branches" in ''Namárië''
